AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: small base on the go
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A very small self-suficient room with two beds, an animal bed, a stove, a wood generator, a heater and a chess table.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: small full house
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A small full house containing a very small 2-person bedroom, a dining room with a kitchen stove and a fermenting barrel and a small animal pen outside.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Reel

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: yellow full house
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A yellow and white full house containing a very small 2-person bedroom, a living room / kitchen with a kitchen stove and a small dining room.

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: suburban house
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A medium sized full suburban house containing a kitchen / living room / dining room, a 1-person bedroom and a garage. Intended to connect to modular prefab road pieces.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Reel

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: noble mansion
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A small mansion fit for a low ranking noble of the Empire. Includes a bedroom, a living room, a dining room, a kitchen, a hall and a bathroom (if you have Dub's Bad Hygiene).

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: very small compact base
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A very small compact base with a bed, research table, fueled stove and chess table.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: small compact base
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A small refrigerated compact base with a bed, research table, electric stove, wood generator and chess table, plus some shelf space.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: medium compact base
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A medium refrigerated compact base with 2 beds, hi-tech research bench, electric stove, wood generator, chess table and horseshoe pin, plus some shelf space.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: medium compact base with freezer
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A medium compact base with 2 beds, hi-tech research bench, multianalyzer, electric stove, wood generator and portable wood generator (if you have VE Power), chess table and horseshoe pin, plus some shelf space. Includes a very small, separate walk-in freezer.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: large compact base
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A large refrigerated compact base with 3 beds, hi-tech research bench, multianalyzer, machining table, tueb television, electric stove, wood generator, chess table and horseshoe pin, plus some shelf space. Includes a very small, separate walk-in freezer.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Eragon

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: self sufficient hut
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A self sufficient hut prepared for living off the grid. Includes three bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, a walk-in freezer, storage and a solar panel plus batteries.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Heretic

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: viking village
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A group of viking huts with 8 single fur beds, a double fur bed, an animal pen, lots of shelves with survival meals and a campfire.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Kolopo
